name: Agrona PR4
flavor_text: Do not be afraid. Our fate cannot be taken from us. It is a gift.

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description: Superb handling. Move faster with this weapon equipped.

perks.description:
Omolon Post sights. Short zoom.
  •  Increases range
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Jolt PS

perks.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds

perks.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Dragonfly
